wikipedia_page.main: Mark Hawkins (born 28 December 1985) is a British handball coach, currently head coach of Norwegian club IK Våg. He was born in Horsham, West Sussex. At the 2012 Summer Olympics he competed with the Great Britain men's national handball team in the men's tournament.

response: * Mark Hawkins - handball player, represented Great Britain
* Mark Hawkins – Great Britain Handball player, represented Team GB at 2012 Summer Olympics
